meanings.definition: Strawflowers: a plant with brightly colored flowers that retain their color and shape when dried
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the strawflowers added a pop of color with their bright petals.
meanings.sent2: She picked some strawflowers to dry and use in her art project.
meanings.sent3: The strawflowers in the vase looked like little bursts of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a strawflower in the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The strawflowers stood out like tiny rainbows against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: Strawflowers: the dried flowers of the plant used in crafts and decorations
meanings.sent1: She bought a bouquet of strawflowers to make a beautiful wreath.
meanings.sent2: The strawflowers added a lovely touch to the centerpiece on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat batted at the strawflowers, thinking they were real prey.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with the sweet scent of strawflowers, even though they were dried.
meanings.sent5: The strawflowers sparkled like tiny jewels on the handmade card.
